樹.definition: tree; CL:棵[ke1]; to cultivate; to set up

樹上開花.definition: to deck the tree with false blossoms; to make something of no value appear valuable (idiom)

樹人.definition: to prepare children to become capable citizens

樹倒猢猻散.definition: When the tree topples the monkeys scatter. (idiom); fig. an opportunist abandons an unfavorable cause; Rats leave a sinking ship.

樹大招風.definition: lit. a tall tree attracts the wind (idiom); fig. a famous or rich person attracts criticism

樹挪死，人挪活.pinyin: shu4 nuo2 si3 , ren2 nuo2 huo2
樹挪死，人挪活.definition: lit. if moved to a new location, a tree will die, but a person will live (idiom); fig. human beings, unlike trees, thrive on change

樹敵.definition: to antagonize people; to make an enemy of sb

樹林市.definition: Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan

樹梢.definition: the tip of a tree; treetop

樹欲靜而風不止.pinyin: shu4 yu4 jing4 er2 feng1 bu4 zhi3
樹欲靜而風不止.definition: lit. the trees long for peace but the wind will never cease (idiom); fig. the world changes, whether you want it or not

樹洞.definition: tree hollow; (slang) anonymous platform for sharing secrets; (slang) confidant

樹獺.definition: (zoology) sloth (rare – the standard term is 樹懶|树懒[shu4lan3])

樹碑立傳.definition: lit. to erect a stele and write a biography (idiom); to monumentalize; to glorify; to sing the praises of

樹葬.definition: burial of cremated remains at the foot of a tree

樹蔭.definition: shade of a tree; Taiwan pr. [shu4yin4]

樹高千丈，落葉歸根.pinyin: shu4 gao1 qian1 zhang4 , luo4 ye4 gui1 gen1
樹高千丈，落葉歸根.definition: see 樹高千丈，葉落歸根|树高千丈，叶落归根[shu4 gao1 qian1 zhang4 , ye4 luo4 gui1 gen1]

樹高千丈，葉落歸根.pinyin: shu4 gao1 qian1 zhang4 , ye4 luo4 gui1 gen1
樹高千丈，葉落歸根.definition: fig. a tree may grow a thousand zhang high, but its leaves return to their roots (proverb); fig. everything has its ancestral home; in old age, an expatriate returns home

樹鷚.definition: (bird species of China) olive-backed pipit (Anthus hodgsoni)

樹麻雀.definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian tree sparrow (Passer montanus)
